snippet: The surrender offered new hope for a region where conflict has gone on for so many years that it has often come to seem almost inevitable.
abstract: Rebels in Democratic Republic of Congo announce they are laying down their arms for good; major turnaround is brought about by rare combination of pressures from around the world, including more aggressive approach to peacekeeping by the United Nations; surrender offers new hope for region where conflict has gone on for so many years that it has often come to seem almost inevitable.
lead_paragraph: The surrender offered new hope for a region where conflict has gone on for so many years that it has often come to seem almost inevitable.

headline.main: After Outside Pressure, Rebels in Congo Lay Down Their Arms
headline.print_headline: After Outside Pressure, Rebels In Congo Lay Down Their Arms
